Package org.example.presentation.utility

package org.example.presentation.utility
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractView
    Abstract class that implements the view panel model.
    BillQueriesActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the read SQL query.
    BillUpdatesActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the create SQL query in the order panel.
    ClientQueriesActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the read SQL query.
    ClientUpdatesActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the creation, update and deletion in the client panel.
    Colors
    Singleton implementation of the colour palette of the application.
    MyButton
    The button model used throughout the project.
    NavigateActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the navigation through the main panels of the GUI.
    OrderPageActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the read SQL query for the order panel.
    OrderUpdatesActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the create SQL query in the order panel.
    ProductQueriesActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the read SQL query.
    ProductUpdatesActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the creation, update and deletion in the product panel.
    View
    Generic interface that implements the standardization of a view.
    ViewNavigateActionListener
    Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the navigation through the specific input views of a panel.
